Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • Country

  • public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
    Data class, which contains all the data for each country in the game.
    Version:
    1.0 06.09.2015
    Author:
    Zachary Teper (0.5 hours) and Angela Zhu (0.5 hours)

               Question[] b,

               java.awt.Image back,
               java.lang.String[] clues)
        Initializes the Country.
        Parameters:
        NAME - String the name of the country
        a - Question[] the easy questions.
        b - Question[] the medium questions.
        c - Question[] the hard questions.
        back - Image the backgoround Image of the country.
        clues - String[] the clues for this country.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandQuestion

        public Question getRandQuestion(int difficulty)
        Returns a random question of the specified difficulty. If statements determine what level of difficulty to return. Local Variables

        index int the question index which will be returned.

        Parameters:
        difficulty - int the difficulty of question to be returned.
        Returns:
        Question a random question of the specified difficulty.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Returns the ScarletGemMain.COUNTRIES array index of the country. If statements control return statements
        Returns:
        int the array index of the country.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Country other)
        Returns true only when other has a name equal to the name of this country.
        Parameters:
        other - Country the Country instance to be compared to.
        Returns:
        boolean true only if the two country's names are equal.
